content: 5 p1 fc p2 fdkc p2 bc p1 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 6 knit the knits purl the purls round 7 p2 fc bc twice p2 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 8 knit knits purl purls to stitch marker *p2 mmc p3 repeat from * round 9 p3 fdkc p2 fdkc p3 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 10 knit the knits purl the purls round 11 p2 bc fc twice p2 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 12 knit knits purl purls to stitch marker *p2 mmc p3 repeat from * round 13 p1 bc p2 fdkc p2 fc p1 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 14 knit the knits purl the purls round 15 bc p2 bc fc p2 fc *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 16 knit knits purl purls to stitch marker *p2 mmc p3 repeat from * round 17-20 repeat rounds 1-4 round 21 p1 fc p2 bdkc p2 bc p1 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 22-24 repeat rounds 6-8 round 25 p3 bdkc p2 bdkc p3 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 26-28 repeat rounds 10-12 round 29 p1 bc p2 bdkc p2 fc p1 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 30-32 repeat rounds 14-16 crown shaping - switch to dpn as needed k2tog around until 10 sts remain on needles cut yarn leaving a 6 tail and weave through live stitches with tapestry needle weave in ends sew on pom-pom enjoy © 2021 gnomadicknits please do not email copy or reproduce this pattern for profit contact caitlinshaw artworks@gmail com 3
